quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Episode and Friends
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, stars, chefs. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of the following chefs made a guest appearance on the sitcom Frasier in 2002, playing himself?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wolfgang Puck

questions.question: Is it true that Bobby Flay, the host of Food Nation and Boy Meets Grill, was the chef who opened Mesa Grill in New York City?
This Emmy Award-winning sitcom stars Jason Lee as a redneck on a quest to repair his Carma, by helping the people he has hurt.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: My Name Is Earl

questions.question: Who plays the central character of J.D. in the Emmy Award-winning sitcom Scrubs?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zach Braff

questions.question: Ray Rachael is famous for promising that you can fix a great meal in 30 minutes.
Whose unique cooking show includes a live audience and lots of bams!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Emeril Lagasse

questions.question: What does Joey dress up as at Monicas Halloween party in season 8 of Friends?
Who did Rachel ask to go buy more candy for her in the episode of friends which aired on November 1, 2001?
In Friends episode The One With The Halloween Party, Phoebe invites her twin sister Ursula to the party. Who plays Ursulas fiance, Eric?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sean Penn

questions.question: Is it true that in South Park there is a character named Damien?
In the episode of Friends, titled The One With The Halloween Party, Rachel was in charge of handing out candy to the trick-or-treaters. What did she start giving out when she ran out of candy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: cash and checks

questions.question: The original host of the program Iron Chef is referred to as what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Chairman

questions.question: Who was the first winner on the US version of Chef Gordon Ramsays reality show Hells Kitchen?
In the episode The One With The Halloween Party, Monica and Joey debate over who would win a fight between Ross and Chandler. What do Ross and Chandler do?

options.text: They pick up Joey and see who can hold him the longest.
They punch each others arm in the same place to see who gives up first.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They arm-wrestle.

questions.question: What store does Alton Brown visit regularly on his show to shop for kitchen utensils and small appliances?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bed, Bath and Beyond

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Episode and Friends
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, villains, mean. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: On what Hawaiian Island is the show Lost filmed?
What was the flight number of the plane that crashed, stranding its passengers?
Sawyer is initially seen reading what book?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Watership Down

questions.question: In the episode of Friends, titled The One With The Halloween Party Rosss girlfriend attends the party, dressed as a nurse. What is her name?
Who is not a character on the TV show Lost?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yunjin Kim

questions.question: How many survivors were there from the crash?
Who were the villains in the film Madagascar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Fussa

questions.question: In the episode of Friends titled The One With The Halloween Party, when Rachel asks one little trick-or-treater what her name is, what does the girl say?

options.text: I cant tell a stranger that.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leilani Mayolanofavich

questions.question: When Eric comes back to get Ursulas purse in the Friends episode The One With The Halloween Party, what does Phoebe do?

options.text: tells him she has a crush on him
tells him Ursula has been lying to him
hides the purse to hurt Ursula

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: tells him Ursula has been lying to him

questions.question: Vincent, the dog on the show, is played by a male golden Labrador retriever.
Who was the wacky villain in the Disney film, Alice in Wonderland?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Queen of Hearts

questions.question: When Ursulas fiance gets to the party in the Friends episode The One With The Halloween Party, the first thing he does is slap Phoebe on the butt.
Hurleys unlucky numbers include 4, 8, 15, and three of the others listed, which is not one of them?
On the TV show Lost, who is revealed to be John Lockes mother?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Emily Annabeth

questions.question: What does the symbol on Claires necklace mean?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Lady and Cinderella
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, oz. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In what year did the TV series ALF debut?
Who was Tarzans nemesis?
Which of the following were kidnapped by Cruella De Vil because of their fur?
Who was the main bad guy in Shark Tale?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Don Lino

questions.question: Captain Hook was after this character but was always outwitted by him.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter Pan

questions.question: The voice of ALF was actually provided by the shows producer.
What was the name of the female villain in Shrek II?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fairy Godmother

questions.question: What is ALFs real first name on the popular sitcom?
Who was trying to eliminate Duchess in The Aristocats?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Butler did it

questions.question: Who tried to get rid of Lady by blaming her for all the damage they had done in Lady and The Tramp?

options.text: The Mouse king and his rats

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Siamese Cats

questions.question: Who was the usurper Prince John trying to eliminate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robin Hood

questions.question: Who was Dorothys nemesis in The Wizard of Oz?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Witch of the West

questions.question: Who was the evil cat in Cinderella?
Who tried to keep Belle away from the the Beast and marry her?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bomb Voyage

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Futurama and Popeye
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, network, cartoon. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What was the name of the family that ALF lived with in the 80s TV hit ALF?
In what year did the popular comic strip character Popeye make his debut?
In the popular cartoon of the same name, Popeye has a ship tattooed on his muscular forearm.
What television network originally aired the TV show ALF?
Who is the first Emperor of the Moon in the animated series Futurama?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Al Gore

questions.question: Which member of the Star Trek cast was not taken to the forbidden planet, Omega 3 in the animated show Futurama?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leonard Nimoy

questions.question: There is a Popeye statue erected in Nebraska.
What monument stands next to the Washington Monument in the episode of Futurama, entitled A Taste of Freedom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Clinton Monument

questions.question: In what year did the Popeye the Sailor cartoon debut?
What was the name of Popeyes hometown according to the popular cartoon?
This vegetable gave cartoon character Popeye superhuman strength when he consumed it.
In an episode of Futurama, entitled Obsoletely Fabulous, Bender is getting his Robot 1-X compatibility upgrade. How much does arm extension cost?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $0.70 per yard

questions.question: Bender, a character from Futurama, has to fly the dark matter tank within three feet of Pluto for what reason?

options.text: To keep as far away from the Neptunians as possible
To prove to Leela that the dark matter is not harmful

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To avoid the toll booth

questions.question: In the series Futurama, Professor Farnsworh tells Bender to install a fake satellite dish to impress the neighbors.
ALF was such a popular character, that he was once featured on 3 TV shows at the same time.

questions.question: What was Doc Adams first name in the series Gunsmoke?

questions.question: Which of these is one of the middle names of fictional character Carla Tortelli?
In the TV series Gunsmoke, Chester Goode was played by Buck Taylor.

Carla Tortelli was one of the few characters featured in every Cheers episode.
What is the name of the saloon ran by Kitty Russell on the show Gunsmoke?

questions.question: Burt Reynolds played Quint Asper on the show Gunsmoke.
What was the first name of Carlas first husband on Cheers from which she got the name Tortelli?
On the hit show Cheers, Carlas second husband was killed in a plane crash.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Lucy and Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, gunsmoke, emergency. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who turns Daniel Oz Osbourne from the Buffy series into a werewolf?
On the show I Love Lucy, Lucy and Ethel land on the observation deck of the Brooklyn Bridge when they pose as space aliens.
What was the last name of Sam, the bartender on the show Gunsmoke?
In what episode of the Buffy series did Buffy kiss Spike for the first time (without any magic intervention)?
Buck Taylor who played Newly OBrien on Gunsmoke named one of his children after Marshal Matt Dillon.
On the sitcom I Love Lucy, how does Lucy ensure that her friends will recognize her when she plays a dead showgirl in a Hollywood movie?

options.text: She paints her name on the soles of her shoes.
She enlists Ethel to add her name to the credits of the show.
She holds up a sign in the background.
She embroiders her name onto her show girl hat.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She paints her name on the soles of her shoes.

questions.question: How many times does Buffy die in the series Buffy the Vampire Slayer?
On the TV show Gunsmoke, Festus Haggen was played by which of these actors?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ken Curtis

questions.question: Lucy, the main character on the TV show I Love Lucy was chosen to play a part in an Italian movie entitled Bitter Grapes.
What does Ricky keep hidden in his closet as an emergency gift on the TV show I love Lucy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A box of chocolates

questions.question: Which character does Buffy meet first in the first official episode of the TV series Buffy the Vampire Slayer?
What was the name of the elderly neighbor who babysat for little Ricky on the sitcom I Love Lucy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mrs. Trumbull

questions.question: The elocution coach that Lucy hires in the TV series I Love Lucy insists she never use what two words?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: swell and lousy

questions.question: What brand of car did the Ricardos and Mertzes drive cross country to California in the TV series I love Lucy?
